Alerts over time","options":{"backgroundColor":"transparent","axisTitleX.text":"Time","chart.stackMode":"stacked","legend.placement":"top"}},"viz_rwsdjRgS":{"type":"viz.rectangle","options":{"fill":"#000000","fillOpacity":0.7,"stroke":"transparent","rx":1}},"viz_suyE9vv2":{"type":"abslayout.line","options":{"strokeDasharray":1,"strokeOpacity":0.6}}},"dataSources":{"ds_wGCpLJMB":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks where (IDS_Attacks.severity=critical OR IDS_Attacks.severity=high) earliest=-48h latest=-24h 
| append 
 [| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks where (IDS_Attacks.severity=critical OR IDS_Attacks.severity=high) earliest=-24h latest=now] 
| appendcols 
 [| makeresults 
 | eval time=now() 
 ] 
| rename time AS _time"},"name":"Intrusions over 24 hours"},"ds_hDBNaDee":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(Malware_Attacks.dest) from datamodel=Malware.Malware_Attacks where Malware_Attacks.action=allowed earliest=-48h latest=-24h 
| append 
 [| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(Malware_Attacks.dest) from datamodel=Malware.Malware_Attacks where Malware_Attacks.action=allowed earliest=-24h latest=now] 
| appendcols 
 [| makeresults 
 | eval time=now() 
 ] 
| rename time AS _time"},"name":"Infected hosts over 24 hours"},"ds_2gyqellE":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(Malware_Attacks.signature) from datamodel=Malware.Malware_Attacks where earliest=-48h latest=-24h 
| append 
 [| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(Malware_Attacks.signature) from datamodel=Malware.Malware_Attacks where earliest=-24h latest=now] 
| appendcols 
 [| makeresults 
 | eval time=now() 
 ] 
| rename time AS _time"},"name":"Malware signitures v Previous 24 Hrs"},"ds_6dSFxfy1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats dc(host) where `infosec-indexes` earliest=-48h latest=-24h 
| append
 [| tstats dc(host) where `infosec-indexes` earliest=-24h latest=now] 
 | appendcols 
 [ | makeresults 
 | eval time=now() 
 ] 
 | rename time AS _time"},"name":"Hosts and Devices Reporting"},"ds_GFfmmPQQ":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(Authentication.user) from datamodel=Authentication where earliest=-48h latest=-24h 
| append 
 [| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(Authentication.user) from datamodel=Authentication where `infosec-indexes` earliest=-24h latest=now]
| appendcols 
 [| makeresults 
 | eval time=now() 
 ] 
| rename time AS _time"},"name":"Accounts Monitored"},"ds_lxiNnJa3":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks by IDS_Attacks.severity 
| rename "IDS_Attacks.*" as "*" 
| eval temp="" 
| chart useother=true first(count) over temp by severity 
| rename temp as count"},"name":"Intrusion Alerts by Severity"},"ds_vvgtgwob":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats prestats=true summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks by _time, IDS_Attacks.severity span=10m | timechart minspan=10m count by IDS_Attacks.severity"},"name":"Intrusion Alerts over Time"},"ds_lhx9Av1t":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats prestats=true summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks where (IDS_Attacks.severity="critical" OR IDS_Attacks.severity="high") by _time, IDS_Attacks.signature span=10m | timechart minspan=10m count by IDS_Attacks.signature useother=f"},"name":"Top 10 Critical/High Severity Intrusion Alerts"},"ds_aLRv1YdY":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"`infosec-indexes` (tag=security OR tag=attack) 
| bucket span=1h@h _time 
| eval tag=mvfilter(match(tag, "failure") OR match(tag, "success") OR match(tag, "access") OR match(tag, "add") OR match(tag, "change") OR match(tag, "delete") OR match(tag, "error") OR match(tag, "misconfiguration") OR match(tag, "vulnerability") OR match(tag, "attack") OR match(tag, "lock") OR match(tag, "cleared") OR match(tag, "email")) 
| stats count, dc(user) AS dc by tag, _time 
| eval hours=tostring(-floor((now() - _time)/3600))."h"
| eval hours=if(hours=="0h","now",hours) 
| sort _time 
| fields hours, tag, count, dc"},"name":"360 View by Accounts: Event Types over Time"},"ds_vmJEBiYV":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"`infosec-indexes` (tag=security OR tag=attack) 
| bucket span=1h@h _time 
| eval tag=mvfilter(match(tag, "failure") OR match(tag, "success") OR match(tag, "access") OR match(tag, "add") OR match(tag, "change") OR match(tag, "delete") OR match(tag, "error") OR match(tag, "misconfiguration") OR match(tag, "vulnerability") OR match(tag, "attack") OR match(tag, "lock") OR match(tag, "cleared") OR match(tag, "email")) 
| stats count, dc(host) AS dc by tag, _time 
| eval hours=tostring(-floor((now() - _time)/3600))."h"
| eval hours=if(hours=="0h","now",hours) 
| sort _time 
| fields hours, tag, count, dc"},"name":"360 View by Hosts: Event Types over Time"},"ds_mJm0RTnn":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"}},"name":"Search_1"}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-24h@h,now"},"title":"Global Time
